description: G1 - Lombardy Poplar (Populus nigra italica) - Re-Pollard back to previous pollard points removing approximately 5-6m of new growth. Final height 8m and spread 2-3m. On the southern tree - reduce southern stem (dead/dying) by 2m below points.G2 - Island - Remove wisteria from Oak and other trees, cut around Scotts Pine to reveal.G3 - Yew (Taxus baccatta) To rear of 75 & 77 Holmesdale Road - Fell holly and poison. Reduce to top of fence and trim to tidyG4 - Yew and Holly - Rear of 79 holmesdale Road - Fell Holly and poison. Reduce Yew to match G3T5 - Ash (Fraxinus excelsior) Re-Pollard back to previous pollard points removing approximately 5m of new growth Final height 10m and spread 6m. T6 - English Oak (Quercus robur) - Spread towards rear of No.1 Pond Way only - Reduce crown to the most recent previous reduction points, removing approx. 2-3m of new growth. Final height unchanged at 16m and final overall spread 6m.T7 - Mock (Acacia dealbata) - O/s 83 Holmesdale Road - Reduce/pollard at 2m. T8 - Mimosa (Acacia dealbata) Rear of No.8 - Reduce to previous reduction points
